cip.render.utilColour

Class Fresnel

  • java.lang.Object
    • cip.render.utilColour.Fresnel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FresnelConductor, FresnelDielectric

    public abstract class Fresnel
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class encapsulating the Fresnel reflectance/transmittance computations for a surface.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fresnel()
      Creates a new instance of Fresnel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RGBf approxFr(RGBf Fr, Vector3f N, Vector3f L)
      Approximate the Fresnel reflectance of the surface for light incident from a specific direction.
      RGBf approxFrFt(RGBf Fr, RGBf Ft, Vector3f N, Vector3f L, Vector3f T, boolean bIn, float n)
      Approximate the Fresnel reflectance and transmittance of the surface for light incident from a specific direction.
      static float approxK(RGBf rgb)
      Approximates the coefficient of extinction for a material from the reflectance for incident light parallel to the normal.
      static float approxN(RGBf rgb)
      Approximates the index of refraction for a material from the reflectance for incident light parallel to the normal.
      abstract float getAveReflectance()
      Returns the average reflectance for an incident ray parallel to the normal.

    • Method Detail

      • approxN

        public static float approxN(RGBf rgb)
        Approximates the index of refraction for a material from the reflectance for incident light parallel to the normal. In this approximation, the coefficient of extinction is assumed to be 0.
        Parameters:
        rgb - The reflectance for incident light parallel to the normal.
        Returns:
        Returns the approximated index of refraction that would produce the reflectance assuming the coefficient of extinction is 0.

      • approxK

        public static float approxK(RGBf rgb)
        Approximates the coefficient of extinction for a material from the reflectance for incident light parallel to the normal. In this approximation, the index of refraction is assumed to be 1.
        Parameters:
        rgb - The reflectance for incident light parallel to the normal.
        Returns:
        Returns the approximated coefficient of extinction that would produce the reflectance assuming the index of refraction is 1.

      • getAveReflectance

        public abstract float getAveReflectance()
        Returns the average reflectance for an incident ray parallel to the normal.
        Returns:
        Returns the average reflectance.

      • approxFr

        public RGBf approxFr(RGBf Fr,
                     Vector3f N,
                     Vector3f L)
        Approximate the Fresnel reflectance of the surface for light incident from a specific direction.
        Parameters:
        Fr - The reflectance.
        N - The normal.
        L - The direction of the light. This vector is directed from the surface to the light.
        Returns:
        Returns the approximated

      • approxFrFt

        public RGBf approxFrFt(RGBf Fr,
                       RGBf Ft,
                       Vector3f N,
                       Vector3f L,
                       Vector3f T,
                       boolean bIn,
                       float n)
        Approximate the Fresnel reflectance and transmittance of the surface for light incident from a specific direction.
        Parameters:
        Fr -
        N -
        L -
        T -
        bIn - true if the ray is going into the material and false if the ray is going out of the material.
        n - The index of refraction on the other side of the material boundary (normally 1.0 for air)
